content: Landed in NYC after a whirlwind in Tokyo. The city's energy is electric, but there's a part of me still in Japan. It's like I've left a piece of my heart there, but I'm ready to start this new chapter. Time to see what the concrete jungle has in store.
Feeling inspired by the city's art scene. Just signed up for a life drawing class. Maybe I'll find some new perspectives here.

Had an enlightening conversation with the life drawing instructor. He talked about the essence of capturing life in its simplest forms. It made me think about my own path, the essence of my goals, and how I can simplify them to focus on what truly matters.
